subject: [Good] Amazon allows you to switch off personalized ads
text:
you can switch off personalized ads:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/dra/info/ref=hp_468496_advertisingpref2

it is not clear to me whether this will also stop them from gathering the data in the first place, or only from displaying the results.

another important question is to what extent advertisers can uniquely identify you. strictly changing what will be displayed to you is arguably not that relevant to how your privacy is really impacted by your use of the service. but, still. :)
